metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7729 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Exempi through 2.4.4. There is a stack-based buffer over-read in the PostScript_MetaHandler::ParsePSFile() function in XMPFiles/source/FileHandlers/PostScript_Handler.cpp.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7729` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exempi - 2.4.5-2
libexempi3 - 2.4.5-2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> code snippet is not in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: exempi package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.5-2').
